doc.summary: Input properties for a plain string.

doc.summary: gets the default value for newly created inputs that have no other default value available.
doc.text: gets the default value for newly created inputs that have no other default value available.

doc.summary: Converts some input into a value matching this input properties.
doc.text: Converts some input into a value matching this input properties. This may fail with an exception only if #isValid(String) returns false for the same input.

doc.summary: Converts a value matching this input properties to a string.
doc.text: Converts a value matching this input properties to a string.

doc.summary: Gets whether the user can enter the given char into the input field.
doc.text: Gets whether the user can enter the given char into the input field.

doc.summary: Gets whether a given user input is valid or not.
doc.text: Gets whether a given user input is valid or not.

doc.summary: Defines which input is valid and how to convert input for text input editors.
